name: The Museum of ThroughView
description: The Museum of ThroughView is a VR museum unlike anything else. This is the first time a virtual reality app showcases 2d to 3d conversions of famous paintings and old photographs. When looking at these paintings in VR, the paintings themselves can also be experienced in 3d.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel(r) i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvdia Gtx 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel(r) i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvdia Gtx 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
